name: European Fund and Asset Management Association
goal:
EFAMA is the representative association for the European investment management industry.

Its mission is:

• to promote optimal conditions for the European fund and asset management industry in its efforts to create value for investors;
• to influence and support the ongoing development of the regulatory environment including the European Single Market;
• to promote the interests of its Members among stakeholders;
• to build confidence and trust in the industry;
• to promote scientific research concerning the industry.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives:
• Capital Markets Union
• Action Plan on Sustainable Finance and related pproposals
• Review of the European System of Financial Supervision (ESFS)
• Pan-European Personal Pensions
• Cross border distribution of funds
• Review of the AIFM Directive
• MiFID II/MiFIR
• MMF Regulation
• PRIIPs Regulation
• EMIR Review
• CCP recovery and resolution
• EC proposal on a prudential regime for investment firms
• Taxation: withholding tax, FTT, BEPS
• Benchmarks Regulation
• Shareholders rights Directive
